King Diamond

Abigail
Formed
1985, København, Hovedstaden, Denmark
Currently
Dallas, TX, United States
Members
King Diamond (vocals, keyboards), Andy LaRocque (guitar, keyboards), Michael Denner (guitar, 1985-87), Timi Hansen (bass, 1985-87), Mikkey Dee (drums, 1985-89), Floyd Konstantin (guitar, 1985), Pete Blakk (guitar, 1987-90), Hal Patino (bass, 1988-90, 2000-14), Chris Whitemeier (drums, 1988), Snowy Shaw (drums, 1989-94), Mike Wead (guitar, 1990-95, 2000-present), Sharlee D'Angelo (bass, 1990-93), Darrin Anthony (drums, 1995-97), Chris Estes (bass, 1995-2000), Herb Simonsen (guitar, 1995-98), John Luke Hebert (drums, 1997-2000), Glen Drover (guitar, 1998-2000), Matt Thompson (drums, 2000-present), David Harbour (bass, 2000), Kol Marshall (keyboards, 2000, 2002), Livia Zita (vocals, 2003-present), Pontus Egberg (bass, 2014-present)
Related Artists
Arch Enemy, Brats, Danger Zone, Death, Dismember, EF Band, Eidolon, Force of Evil, Helloween, Hexenhaus, Illwill, King Diamond and Black Rose, Maryann Cotton, Megadeth, Mercyful Fate, Motörhead, Shaolin Death Squad, Sinergy, Spiritual Beggars, Taylor's Universe, Witchery, X-World/5
Genres
Heavy Metal, Halloween Music
